original: intros. unfold is_lim. intros eps. exists eps. intros. unfold Rdiv. rewrite ln_div. rewrite Rabs_mult. rewrite Rabs_Rinv. rewrite Rabs_ln. apply (Rlt_le_trans _ 1). apply ln_lt_2. auto. apply ln_continue. auto. apply ln_1. apply Rlt_0_2. auto. apply H0. unfold Rabs. apply Rlt_0_1.
